glsa.title: Vobcopy: Insecure temporary file creation
glsa.synopsis: Vobcopy uses temporary files in an insecure manner, allowing for a symlink attack.

background.p: Vobcopy is a tool for decrypting and copying DVD .vob files to a hard disk.

description.p: Joey Hess reported that vobcopy appends data to the file "/tmp/vobcopy.bla" in an insecure manner.

impact.p: A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to conduct symlink attacks and append data to arbitrary files with the privileges of the user running Vobcopy.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Vobcopy users should upgrade to the latest version:
